TB Preventative Therapy (TPT) for pregnant and breastfeeding women 
• T PT has been shown to reduce the incidence of TB in all people living with HIV, including those on ART
• TPT is NOT currently recommended to pregnant HIV positive women, due to safety concerns, but can be
initiated post-delivery where indicated
• TPT regimen:
o Isoniazid 300mg daily
o Pyridoxine 25mg daily
• Duration of treatment:
o TPT should be given for 12 months
• Contra-indications for TPT
